appDevelopmentProjects.name: Food Delivery App
appDevelopmentProjects.description: A mobile app for ordering food from local restaurants with real-time tracking, secure payments, and personalized recommendations.

appDevelopmentProjects.name: Fitness Tracker App
appDevelopmentProjects.description: A fitness app that tracks workouts, monitors progress, and integrates with wearable devices for real-time health data.

appDevelopmentProjects.name: Ride-Hailing App
appDevelopmentProjects.description: A taxi booking app with real-time driver tracking, fare estimation, and cashless payments for a hassle-free ride experience.
